product_info.title: ZC100 CARD PRINTER
product_info.tagline: the encoding option of your choice
product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZC100 CARD PRINTER
ZC100 Card Printer
Next Generation simplicity and security in a ‘fit everywhere’ design
Whether you need to print single-sided employee identity badges or membership and event guest cards, card printing is a crucial
aspect of your business. Deployment flexibility and the time it takes to print and manage your card printing solutions all have an
impact on your business — from your brand image to staff productivity, overall operational efficiency and operating costs. Now,
there’s a new kind of card printer designed to address it all — the ZC100. You get groundbreaking simple operation and the slimmest
fit-everywhere design, along with a toolbox of additional capabilities that make the ZC100 even easier to integrate, use and manage.
A New Ingenious Card Feeder Handles Varying Card Thickness
On-the-Fly
The card feeder instantly adjusts to the thickness of each card
— no more adjusting for different card stocks.
The Most Intuitive LEDs
With our well-tested intuitive icons, a quick glance is all it will
take for your users to see the status of the ZC100.
Innovative New Driver With a Graphical User Interface
The intuitive interface in the newly-designed driver makes it
easier than ever to print cards. Settings are grouped logically
into tabs where they are easily accessible with a click. A visual
display of your card allows you to instantly see how your card
Elegantly Engineered for Game-Changing looks and how setting changes impact card design —
eliminating the time and cost to repeatedly print test cards.
Simplicity
Revolutionary New Hopper Design
Painless Plug-and-Play Deployment The completely re-designed hopper makes loading and
The ZC100 is designed to work right out of the box. There’s no unloading cards easier than ever. With the saloon-style output
time-consuming complicated set-up — just plug it in and start doors, there’s nothing to open — just grab one card or the
reaping the benefits the day your printer arrives. whole stack of cards. And the input and output hoppers have
the same capacity, reducing the need to refill and empty the
hoppers.
Fool-Proof Ribbon Changing
Changing a ribbon has never been so simple and
uncomplicated — no instructions required. Unlock and open
the newly designed ribbon door latch in one motion. The
unique doorhandle style grip leaves no question about how to
remove or insert the ribbon. And with embedded smartchips,
you always know when to change the ribbon.
Step up to the Next Generation in card printing with the ZC100.
For more information, visit www.zebra.com/zc100
--- Page 2 ---
Effortless Manual Card Feed AES Data Encryption
Manually feeding a card can be complicated — we made it Government-grade encryption protects the most sensitive
simple with a lightpipe that guides the user through the data during printing, such as account numbers.
manual feeding process, the same way that automatic teller
machines guide users through their interaction. Fast and Flexible Printing
We Speak Your Language
Fast Single-Sided Color and Monochrome Printing
Workers can interact with the ZC100 in their native tongue
We took a good thing and made it better. The ZC100 prints up
with driver support for multiple languages — English, French,
to 30% faster in monochrome and 15% faster in color than its
Italian, Spanish, Portuguese (Brazilian), German, Polish,
predecessor, Zebra’s ZXP Series 1 card printers.
Russian, Simplified Chinese and Arabic.
Basic Encoding Options
Ground-Breaking ‘Fits Everywhere’ Design
Whether you are printing employee badges, ID cards, season
passes and membership cards or credit and debit cards, you
Good Looks That Fit in Anywhere can choose the encoding option of your choice. Add a
Even though the ZC100 is built for business, it has the ‘swipe-and-go’ magnetic stripe when you print cards.
consumer good looks required to fit in customer facing areas,
from the retail store to the hospital admission desk. Boost Value With the Right Support
Sized to Fit Wherever You Need Printing
Protect Your Investment With Zebra’s Superior Support
Your printer shouldn’t dictate where you can issue cards — it Services
should fit wherever card printing is needed. From the minimal
No matter what level of support you need, there is a Zebra
footprint and the slimmest profile to the lowest clearance in
support service that is just right for your business. With Zebra
this printer class, the ZC100 was designed to fit in the most
OneCare, no matter what happens to your printer, it’s covered.
possible places — including under a counter or shelf.
If you just need access to technical support, choose Zebra’s
Technical Software and Support (TSS). And if you want help
All the Connectivity Options You Need
setting up and configuring the hundreds of settings on local
Connect to one computer through the onboard USB to create and remote ZC100 printers, our Install and Configuration
a standalone printing station. Or, add optional Ethernet or Assistance (ICA) Select program provides the support you
Wi-Fi to give everyone who needs card printing instant access, need.
maximizing printer usage. And improve deployment flexibility
with Wi-Fi — the time and cost to run network cabling to your
printers is eliminated.
Printer Cover Lock
The printer cover lock prevents the theft of card stock,
providing the security required to install in public-facing areas.
Advanced Security
Printer and Host Authentication
Advanced security features enable printer-to-host
authentication to prevent printing from unauthorized
applications or devices.

Specifications
Markets and
Applications
Standard Features Operating Characteristics
Retail/Hospitality
• 300 dpi (11.8 dots/mm) print resolution Operating 59º F to 95º F/15º C to 35º C
• 2 GB flash memory Temp. • Membership cards
• Image size: 1006 x 640 pixels • Events and season passes
• Auto calibration of ribbon Operating 20% to 80% non-condensing • Guest and passenger cards
• USB 2.0 connectivity Humidity • Food safety labeling
• 100 card capacity auto-adjusting input hopper (30 mil)
• 100 card capacity output hopper (30 mil)
• Manual card feeding capability with LED bezel Media Storage — Temperature: 41º F to 77º F/5º C to 25º C Identification
• 3 Tricolor printer status indicator lights — Humidity: 35% to 65% non-condensing
• Kensington™ secure lock slot • Employee badges
• Printer host authentication and data encryption Electrical • Auto-switching single-phase AC power
• Visitor badges
• Print Touch NFC tag and Quick Help QR code for online printer • Operating range: 90-132VAC and

access
• Three-year limited warranty on printer and printhead • Frequency range: 47-63 Hz
• FCC Class A
Printing Specifications
Physical Characteristics
• Dye-sublimation thermal transfer direct to
card print method Dimensions 10.2 in. H x 6.2 in. W x 15.1 in. D
• Full-color or monochrome printing 258 mm H x 157 mm W x 383 mm D
• Single-sided printing
• Edge-to-edge printing on standard CR-80 Weight 8.6 lbs (3.9 kg)
media

on batch printing with USB connectivity.

configuration.

Media Specifications
NOTE: For optimum print quality and printer
performance, use of Genuine Zebra supplies
is recommended.
• Card Thickness: 10-40 mil*
• Card Size: CR80 ISO 7810 ID-1 format, CR79*
• Card Material: PVC and PVC composite
• Adhesive back and writable back cards
*Note: Spot color or monochrome printing
recommended only on >20 mil thick cards
and CR79 cards.
